alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:53AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Grant, southeastern Red River, Natchitoches, east central Sabine and southwestern Winn Parishes through 630 AM CDT... At 552 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 10 miles north of Kurthwood, or 17 miles northeast of Anacoco, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Campti, Montgomery, Allen, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Calvin, Robeline, Atlanta, Powhatan, Lake End, Kisatchie, Cloutierville, Melrose, Bellwood, Chopin, St. Maurice and Joyce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Winn
